metadata.name: Dark Mists: Kurotobi Skies
metadata.description: Leading Geisha and unofficial Yakuza assassin, Kimi, is missing, in the wake of her lover's murder, leaving Corrupt Government official Osamu primed to infiltrate the Government with his Yakuza army and worryingly for Kimi's sisters: control Gion. Meanwhile in a small village, a girl is found floating in the river.
